channel.title: This board versus the intellectual debates board
channel.description:
This one if for all debates first, before the intellectual discussion board. That board is for specifically complex debates that provoke intelligible arguments from multiple sides, whereas this debates board is for anything that will get you arguing. Ie, we don't care so much about opinions in this board, but you better be sure to have excellent resources and logic backing you up in the other.
Post if you have any questions to distinguish the two.

item.title: This board versus the intellectual debates board

item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:11, topic:467976”]So uh,

There is absolutely no difference in quality between the two debate sections. How about we merge them back :P[/quote]
Yes. Or merge Intellectual debates to General debates and start clean with a new Intellectual board.

Read full topic

item.source: This board versus the intellectual debates board

item.title: This board versus the intellectual debates board
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:4, topic:467976”]Will some of the threads be moved back to this section then? Having made this, the other section would seem quite polluted at the moment.

edit: And this may not be the place to talk about it, but I’m also doubting the purpose of this. Does moparscape really need 2 debate sections? I would also enjoy reading a section of purely intellectual debate but I can’t even see that working here. And does anyone else find the word “general” is being used too much, or am i ocd[/quote]

I generally find that the word general is used in excess around these parts but generally speaking, generals general general

generally, gen, gen, ge, ge-ne-rally, g-g-ge-rally

IT MAKES NO SENSE ANYMORE

Read full topic
